information_modal.footer: If you have any questions or need assistance feel free to email us at support@reach4help.org.

OpenRequestsContainer.title: Still looking for help ...
OpenRequestsContainer.0: Your requests are out there but no one has yet volunteered to help
OpenRequestsContainer.1: You will also be receiving notifications to update you about the status of your requests.
OpenRequestsContainer.2: If you have any questions or difficulty with this, don't hesitate to contact support@reach4help.org!

AcceptedRequestsContainer.title: Someone has offered to help!
AcceptedRequestsContainer.0: Someone has offered to help you out.
AcceptedRequestsContainer.1: Get in touch with them by phone to work out the details.

OngoingRequestsContainer.title: Matched with a Volunteer!
OngoingRequestsContainer.0: You matched with someone who is taking care of your request.

FinishedRequestsContainer.title: All Done!
FinishedRequestsContainer.0: You and the volunteer agree that everything is done.

ArchivedRequestsContainer.title: You decided not to do it
ArchivedRequestsContainer.0: You changed your mind and deleted your request.

TimelineViewContainer.title: View each step of your request
TimelineViewContainer.2: The offer is accepted or rejected.
TimelineViewContainer.6: Volunteers and People In Need rate each other.

MenuDrawer.title: Using the Bottom Buttons
MenuDrawer.0: Press the Left Menu to keep track of each step of your request
MenuDrawer.1: Open: Requests that still need a volunteer
MenuDrawer.2: Accepted: Someone has offered to help you out.
MenuDrawer.3: Ongoing: A volunteer is working on your request now.
MenuDrawer.4: Finished: The volunteer has completed the request.
MenuDrawer.6: Press the Left Bell to see your notifications

FindRequestsContainer.title: Welcome to Reach4Help!
FindRequestsContainer.1: As a volunteer, you'll be able to help people in your area by responding to their help requests.
FindRequestsContainer.2: Use this map to search for people in need.
FindRequestsContainer.3: Click on an orange marker to view that person's request and decide whether to accept it
FindRequestsContainer.4: Once the person in need accepts your offer for help, you will exchange contact information.
FindRequestsContainer.5: Check the Notifications panel to see updates about your offers to help.
FindRequestsContainer.6: Thank you for joining us in building this unified platform of help!

NewRequestsContainer.title: Welcome to Reach4Help!
NewRequestsContainer.0: Thank you for joining Reach4Help! As a person in need, you'll be able reach out for help in your area by creating requests. Currently, we can't guarantee that there are volunteers who can help in your area, in which case we'd suggest sharing it with potential volunteers and local volunteer organizations. Thank you for joining us in building this unified platform of help!
NewRequestsContainer.1: Thank you for submitting a request! You'll be notified when a volunteer offers to accept it. To check its status, click/tap here or check
NewRequestsContainer.2: Check the Notifications panel to see updates about your incoming offers.
NewRequestsContainer.3: Po przyjęciu oferty, Twoje informacje zostaną udostępnione wolontariuszowi.
NewRequestsContainer.4: Skontaktuj się z wolontariuszem (lub poczekaj, aż skontaktują się z Tobą), aby skoordynować.

login.title: Osiągnij 4Pomoc
login.info:
Witaj! Dziękujemy za zainteresowanie wsparciem swojej społeczności! Zapewnienie bezpieczeństwa naszym użytkownikom, obecnie wymagamy zalogowania za pośrednictwem Google lub Facebooka, aby zweryfikować Twoją tożsamość i skontaktować się z Tobą w razie jakichkolwiek rozbieżności.

Po tym kroku zostaniesz poproszony o podanie numeru telefonu i zweryfikowanie go za pomocą kodu, który otrzymasz za pomocą tekstu. W ten sposób ludzie oferujący pomoc skontaktują się z Tobą! Dane kontaktowe są udostępniane drugiej osobie tylko wtedy, gdy zatwierdzą Państwo osobę proponującą im pomoc. Kiedy wysyłasz prośbę o pomoc, Twoja dokładna lokalizacja nie jest udostępniona (tylko trzy pierwsze cyfry Twojego kodu pocztowego).
Dziękujemy za współpracę w uczynieniu naszego świata bezpieczniejszym i bardziej pomocnym miejscem! Jeśli masz jakieś pytania, skontaktuj się z nami pod adresem support@reach4help. rg.

phoneNumber.sub_title: Wprowadź swój numer telefonu, aby się zalogować
phoneNumber.info: Ta informacja ma zasadnicze znaczenie dla weryfikacji Twojego konta. Dane i stawki mogą być stosowane.
phoneNumber.phone_valid: Prawidłowy numer telefonu zaczyna się od + i kodu kraju bez spacji lub innych znaków specjalnych w polu!
phoneNumber.is_plus_11: nie jest prawidłowym numerem telefonu. Nie wpisuj kodu kraju w polu wejściowym. Użyj tylko wyboru kraju
phoneNumber.bad_11_prefix: Nieprawidłowy numer: +11 jest prefiksem kraju dla Bułgarii, nie Kanady ani Stanów Zjednoczonych. Nie wpisuj '1' jako wiodącą cyfrę

verificationCode.sub_title: Właśnie napisaliśmy Ci kod potwierdzający. Wprowadź go poniżej.

user_data_form.sub_title: Please fill out the personal details below.
user_data_form.gps_button: Use GPS to get my address
user_data_form.geolocation_modal_text: You can add your location manually, but it would help us get your position more accurately if you would use Geolocation. Please choose one of the options below :
user_data_form.geolocation_unavailable_title: Unfortunately, we are not yet available in your location
user_data_form.geolocation_unavailable_text: Sorry your location is not yet supported on our platform.  You will be notified by SMS or E-Mail, once our application becomes available at your location.
user_data_form.instructions_modal_text: You can add your location manually, but it would help us get your position more accurately if you used Geolocation. If you wish to re-activate it, please follow the link :
user_data_form.policy_text: We need this data to ensure the help reaches the correct destination. For any concerns, please read our

user_data_form.terms_conditions_error: You need to accept the Terms & Conditions.
user_data_form.allow_send_notifications: I would like Reach4Help to send me notifications and emails.

form.body: Enter details of what is needed

newRequestSuccess.title: Your request has been created
newRequestSuccess.info: Please be patient until you get an offer from a volunteer.
newRequestSuccess.remember_info: Once a volunteer offers to help, you must accept their help in order for them to see your contact information.

roleinfo.title: Reach4Help
roleinfo.manifesto: We believe that everything we do is meaningful. We believe we are capable of enabling people in their sense of togetherness and community. We believe solidarity brings out the best in individuals.
roleinfo.info: Please tell us what is your purpose to use Reach4Help
roleinfo.info_pin: I'm here because I need help
roleinfo.info_cav: I'm here because I want to help people
